direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve checking and advancing the iterator, with similar control flow and exception handling.
Both methods navigate through the list, with similar internal logic for setting and clearing objects.
The next method relies on setNextObject to find the next valid element, indicating a strong dependency.
The next method clears the next object after returning it, indicating a dependency on clearNextObject.
Both methods involve setting objects based on predicate checks, though they navigate in opposite directions.
The next method indirectly relies on clearPreviousObject when navigating back and forth in the list.
